Title: Chief Information Officer
Headline: People in the News
Industry: Healthcare; Pharmaceuticals; & Biotech : Healthcare; Pharmaceuticals; & Biotech Other
What Happened: The Rothman Institute appointed Daniel Walsh as Chief Information Officer
About Person: Walsh most recently ran the information-technology division for Apollo Health Street Inc.; Conshohocken.
About Company: The Rothman Institute is affiliated with Hospitals consisting of state-of-the-art facilities befitting world-class orthopaedic centers. Everything; from clinical and surgical centers; a fully equipped imaging area (with the latest MRI equipment) and a physical therapy center; to a pain management area; an orthotic center and research laboratories; libraries and an educational center is all under one roof.
